title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Technology-Based Informal Customized Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and experience in utilizing digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously design customized learning content in science using mobile and SaaS-based platforms.
Learners can curate and version-manage science-related learning materials from digital marketplaces and apply them to project-based tasks.
Learners can generate science learning experiences connected to real-life contexts using location-based technology at least three times.
Learners can understand SCORM standard extension technologies and track learning outcomes in personal device environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
